ygData.subject: Adjusting status
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I know this might make a few people mad. I am planning on switching out everyone who has Web Only status for receiving messages to Special Announcements

Subject: Adjusting status
Message-ID: <9jpo6q+6cjj@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 464
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Ok, I know this might make a few people mad.

I am planning on switching out everyone who has 'Web Only' status for 
receiving messages to 'Special Announcements Only' status for 
receiving messages.  Only moderators can post 'Special Announcements'. 
 I am going to do this in order to test out email addresses and check 
for continued interest in this group.

I don't plan on posting 'Special Announcements' out with any 
predictability (once a month or fewer).
